Pre-Game Insights: The Nets were without several key players due to injuries, including Cam Thomas, Cam Johnson, and Ben Simmons.
Joel Embiid was active but received an early technical foul.
Post-Match Reflections: The Nets dropped to 13-22 on the season with the loss.
The team looked for momentum heading into upcoming home games against the Indiana Pacers and Detroit Pistons.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nets struggled with 22 turnovers and 32 points conceded off those miscues.
No Nets player scored over 20 points in the game.
Others: The game was played at Barclays Center.
Tosan Evbuomwan and Reece Beekman made their first official NBA appearances.
